column1: The cat sat on the mat.
She went to the market yesterday.
I like reading books in the evening.
The weather forecast predicts rain tomorrow.
He works as a software engineer.
They are planning a vacation next month.
This sentence is intentionally very long and contains multiple clauses to test tokenization limits during fine-tuning.
Machine translation quality estimation is crucial for deployment.
Neural networks require large amounts of training data.
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
